It is provided "as is" without express or implied 34 // warranty. 35 42 #ifdef PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC 43 44 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 45 inline typename PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC::size_type 46 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 47 size() const 48 { return m_num_used_e; } 49 50 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 51 inline typename PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC::size_type 52 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 53 max_size() const 54 { return m_entry_allocator.max_size(); } 55 56 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 57 _GLIBCXX_NODISCARD 58 inline bool 59 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 60 empty() const 61 { return (size() == 0); } 62 63 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 64 template<typename Other_HT_Map_Type> 65 bool 66 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 67 operator==(const Other_HT_Map_Type& other) const 68 { return cmp_with_other(other); } 69 70 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 71 template<typename Other_Map_Type> 72 bool 73 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 74 cmp_with_other(const Other_Map_Type& other) const 75 { 76 if (size() != other.size()) 77 return false; 78 79 for (typename Other_Map_Type::const_iterator it = other.begin(); 80 it != other.end(); ++it) 81 { 82 key_const_reference r_key =(key_const_reference)PB_DS_V2F(*it); 83 mapped_const_pointer p_mapped_value = 84 const_cast<PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC& >(*this). 85 find_key_pointer(r_key, traits_base::m_store_extra_indicator); 86 87 if (p_mapped_value == 0) 88 return false; 89 90 #ifdef PB_DS_DATA_TRUE_INDICATOR 91 if (p_mapped_value->second != it->second) 92 return false; 93 #endif 94 } 95 return true; 96 } 97 98 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 99 template<typename Other_HT_Map_Type> 100 bool 101 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 102 operator!=(const Other_HT_Map_Type& other) const 103 { return !operator==(other); } 104 #endif
